short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A 'new tab' extension, made by a product hunter for product hunters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[Currently in Beta]
If your busy agenda doesn't help you to keep your streak and engage everyday with the Product Hunt community, this extension is perfect for you.
We will keep track of the last time you engaged and of your streak - so you can focus more on other things.
